MRN_SYN_0_style_2: PROCEDURE: Endobronchial Ultrasound-Guided Transbronchial Needle Aspiration (EBUS-TBNA). Under moderate sedation, the EBUS bronchoscope was advanced. A systematic interrogation of the mediastinum id[REDACTED] FDG-avid lymphadenopathy. Stations 4R (right lower paratracheal), 7 (subcarinal), and 10R (right hilar) were sequentially sampled. Rapid on-site evaluation (ROSE) confirmed metastatic adenocarcinoma.
